name: I'm In (ConnorBohan, otyc)
description:
If you've been waiting for a game that simulates being a network admin for a large corporation in the '90s, your wait is over! Viruses have infected your network and you have to get rid of them. Use exciting commands like 'ssh',  'rm', and a few I made up to keep your network safe from viruses. 

Special thanks to the following for their music and sound effects:

FoxSynergy

jobromedia

You're Perfect Studio

HaelDB

dklon
